Title: Elisa & Marcela
Writer: Isabel Coixet (screenplay by), Narciso de Gabriel (based on the literary essay by)
Actors: Natalia de Molina, Greta Fernández, Sara Casasnovas, Tamar Novas
Plot: In 1901, Elisa Sanchez Loriga took on the identity of Mario Sánchez to marry her lover of fifteen years, Marcela Gracia Ibeas.
